snippet: Attorneys who represent whistle-blowers have made millions as the Obama administration cracks down on corporate fraud, and are now donating heavily to the president’s re-election campaign.
abstract: Lawyers representing whistle-blowers have made millions as the Obama administration cracks down on corporate fraud, and are now donating heavily to the president’s re-election campaign; lawyers in the tight circle who specialize in filing fraud claims with the federal government on behalf of clients with evidence of wrongdoing have raised more than $3 million for the Obama campaign and have also donated heavily to Congressional Democrats.
lead_paragraph: Attorneys who represent whistle-blowers have made millions as the Obama administration cracks down on corporate fraud, and are now donating heavily to the president’s re-election campaign.

headline.seo: Whistle-Blowers’ Lawyers Donate to Obama Campaign
headline.main: A Legal Circle Reaches Deep to Aid Obama
headline.print_headline: A Legal Circle Reaches Deep To Aid Obama

keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
